column1: Local Foods////Menu is great. Not an overwhelming novel for food. Just one page
column2: decent picks with enough variety. I got the chicken crunch and cilantro soup and my wife got a vietnamese sandwich with kale and pasta sides. Both of our meals were awesome. The chicken crunch had a lot of flavor
column3: great tasting in-house made bread. The soup was vibrant and citrus'y. My wife's sandwich was slammed with all kinds of good vietnamese flavors. Her kale side was that great
column4: but the couscous style side was decent. Not a foody by no means
column5: but food definitely worth the visit
